ghostPost.title: Self-esteem
ghostPost.excerpt: People generally say that high-self-esteem makes people think in a positive way and everything goes well because of the high-self-esteem. On the contrary, low-self-esteem makes people think in a negative way which makes everything goes not well. What's self-esteem?
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: People generally say that high-self-esteem makes people think in a positive way and everything goes well because of the high-self-esteem. On the contrary, low-self-esteem makes people think in a negative way which makes everything goes not well. What's self-esteem?
ghostPost.meta_description: People generally say that high-self-esteem makes people think in a positive way and everything goes well because of the high-self-esteem.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

ghostPost.plaintext:
What is self-esteem?
Self-esteem is the feeling of accepting yourself positively by thinking that you
are valuable and keeping the high dignity of yourself. In other words, it means
that you self-evaluate yourself, your value, abilitiese and aptitudes positively
and love yourself. Those who have positive feelings toward themselves are
generally positive toward others, whereas those who view themselves negatively
are generally said to be negative toward others. 

If we want to live a worthwhile life, there are things we must do. it is respect
and love yourself. Those who hate themselves can do nothing of value, and people
who don't know that they are loved and precious are busy to take a pessimistic
view of life and the world.

Photo by Paola Chaaya
[https://unsplash.com/@paolitta?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
These days, a feeling of hatred for you and others replaces your self-esteem.
Those who fail to hate others blame and demean themselves. A distorted mind only
ruins themselves.

They think that only matter and wealth are the whole world, and if they can't
have it, they dismiss it as unhappy. Economic conditions do not make our lives
happy. Diverse lives enrich us, and our existence alone can be respected. What
we need in the present is self-esteem.

Photo by Annie Spratt
[https://unsplash.com/@anniespratt?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Let's look at the characteristics of people with high self-esteem
[/people-with-high-self-esteem] in next post.
ghostPost.html:
What is self-esteem?

Self-esteem is the feeling of accepting yourself positively by thinking that you are valuable and keeping the high dignity of yourself. In other words, it means that you self-evaluate yourself, your value, abilitiese and aptitudes positively and love yourself. Those who have positive feelings toward themselves are generally positive toward others, whereas those who view themselves negatively are generally said to be negative toward others.

If we want to live a worthwhile life, there are things we must do. it is respect and love yourself. Those who hate themselves can do nothing of value, and people who don't know that they are loved and precious are busy to take a pessimistic view of life and the world.

These days, a feeling of hatred for you and others replaces your self-esteem. Those who fail to hate others blame and demean themselves. A distorted mind only ruins themselves.

They think that only matter and wealth are the whole world, and if they can't have it, they dismiss it as unhappy. Economic conditions do not make our lives happy. Diverse lives enrich us, and our existence alone can be respected. What we need in the present is self-esteem.

Let's look at the characteristics of people with high self-esteem in next post.

prev.title: People with high self-esteem
prev.excerpt: When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. It is that they have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.
prev.custom_excerpt: When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. It is that they have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.
prev.meta_description: People with high self-esteem never depend, and they are not afraid of mistakes also not afraid of rejection. They acknowledge their weaknesses.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

prev.plaintext:
> When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own
characteristics. They have the power to be grateful for even the smallest
things.
Let's talk about the characteristics and commonalities of people with high
self-esteem. Self-esteem affects our lives more than we think and can make us
more positive and energetic. as posted earlier, self-esteem is a heart to
respect one's dignity, love one's self, and respect one's self. The smaller the
size of this mind is, the easier it is to be shaken by the wrods and
circumstances of the people around you and hurt yourself without your knowledge. 

If so, let's think about what characteristics of people with high self-esteem
have in common.

Photo by Oziel Gómez
[https://unsplash.com/@ozgomz?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
People with high self-esteem
Don't depend
People with high self-esteem never depend. As your heart to seek recognition and
empathy from the other person is increased, your dependence will eventually
increase. Efforts to build yourself up is more important than the stability
gained by depending on the other person.

Not afraid of mistakes
Everyone makes mistakes. We learn and grow from mistakes, but people with low
self-esteem are busy blaming themselves for mistakes. When we work thinking that
no one is perfect, mistakes become a factor that grows us.

Don't be afraid of rejection
In life, there are cases when you ask someone to ask for it. People with high
self-esteem are not hurt even if they are rejected by the other person. If I
have the right to make an offer to the other person, the other person has the
right to decline the offer. Most people don't refuse because they hate you.

Acknowledge your weaknesses
People have many weaknesses. Rather than trying to hide your weaknesses, you
need to be confident and accept them. If you admit your weaknesses as they are,
weaknesses can turn into strengths. People with low self-esteem see only
weaknesses in themselves.

Don't care about others' eyes
People with high self-esteem do not confine themselves to public appraisal. You
don't care how others see you, you just do your job. He refers to other people's
opinions, but only if he is not influenced, he can live his own life. We have
the right to choose our own life and live independently.

Photo by Wilhelm Gunkel
[https://unsplash.com/@wilhelmgunkel?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Don't blame
If you have low self-esteem, it's easy to attribute the cause to others. You are
responsible for what you decide. People with high self-esteem are never to
blame. They know how to accept the results, take them humbly, and try to do the
next job.

Don't misrepresent the other person
People with low self-esteem are busy trying to misrepresent others if they don't
misrepresent themselves. Conversely, a person with high self-esteem appreciates
and praises the other person's strengths. Looking at the bad points, it is easy
to see only the endless bad parts. People who love me don't hate others.

Not very angry
People with strong self-esteem do not get angry. I am not easily hurt by what
others say, and I rarely get angry after all. When you're angry, focus on
resolving your feelings and ask,'Is this really something that makes you angry?'
I worry. A person with weak self-esteem gets angry when he has a strong heart to
protect himself.

Like new things
People with high self-esteem make life decisions according to their will. He is
not afraid of new things and has the courage to pioneer. He doesn't get all the
results he wants by buying a new job. However, a person with high self-esteem
only lives with his or her life at risk.

Don't obsess over self-esteem
Those who succeed objectively do not necessarily have high self-esteem.
Self-esteem can be low or high depending on the situation. The self-esteem built
up by force is unsettling. It is better to recognize and love the way you are,
rather than trying to increase your self-esteem.

Photo by Maria Teneva
[https://unsplash.com/@miteneva?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Let's talk about people with low self-esteem [/people-with-low-self-esteem/] in
the next post.
prev.html:
When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. They have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.

Let's talk about the characteristics and commonalities of people with high self-esteem. Self-esteem affects our lives more than we think and can make us more positive and energetic. as posted earlier, self-esteem is a heart to respect one's dignity, love one's self, and respect one's self. The smaller the size of this mind is, the easier it is to be shaken by the wrods and circumstances of the people around you and hurt yourself without your knowledge.

If so, let's think about what characteristics of people with high self-esteem have in common.

People with high self-esteem

Don't depend

People with high self-esteem never depend. As your heart to seek recognition and empathy from the other person is increased, your dependence will eventually increase. Efforts to build yourself up is more important than the stability gained by depending on the other person.

Not afraid of mistakes

Everyone makes mistakes. We learn and grow from mistakes, but people with low self-esteem are busy blaming themselves for mistakes. When we work thinking that no one is perfect, mistakes become a factor that grows us.

Don't be afraid of rejection

In life, there are cases when you ask someone to ask for it. People with high self-esteem are not hurt even if they are rejected by the other person. If I have the right to make an offer to the other person, the other person has the right to decline the offer. Most people don't refuse because they hate you.

Acknowledge your weaknesses

People have many weaknesses. Rather than trying to hide your weaknesses, you need to be confident and accept them. If you admit your weaknesses as they are, weaknesses can turn into strengths. People with low self-esteem see only weaknesses in themselves.

Don't care about others' eyes

People with high self-esteem do not confine themselves to public appraisal. You don't care how others see you, you just do your job. He refers to other people's opinions, but only if he is not influenced, he can live his own life. We have the right to choose our own life and live independently.

Don't blame

If you have low self-esteem, it's easy to attribute the cause to others. You are responsible for what you decide. People with high self-esteem are never to blame. They know how to accept the results, take them humbly, and try to do the next job.

Don't misrepresent the other person

People with low self-esteem are busy trying to misrepresent others if they don't misrepresent themselves. Conversely, a person with high self-esteem appreciates and praises the other person's strengths. Looking at the bad points, it is easy to see only the endless bad parts. People who love me don't hate others.

Not very angry

People with strong self-esteem do not get angry. I am not easily hurt by what others say, and I rarely get angry after all. When you're angry, focus on resolving your feelings and ask,'Is this really something that makes you angry?' I worry. A person with weak self-esteem gets angry when he has a strong heart to protect himself.

Like new things

People with high self-esteem make life decisions according to their will. He is not afraid of new things and has the courage to pioneer. He doesn't get all the results he wants by buying a new job. However, a person with high self-esteem only lives with his or her life at risk.

Don't obsess over self-esteem

Those who succeed objectively do not necessarily have high self-esteem. Self-esteem can be low or high depending on the situation. The self-esteem built up by force is unsettling. It is better to recognize and love the way you are, rather than trying to increase your self-esteem.

Let's talk about people with low self-esteem in the next post.

next.title: sudo without password
next.excerpt: I use my intel NUC, Raspberry Pi and iMac alone and feel aways inconvenience to enter password when I run sudo command. Here I like to introduce how to run sudo without password and pkexec use case.
next.custom_excerpt: I use my intel NUC, Raspberry Pi and iMac alone and feel aways inconvenience to enter password when I run sudo command. Here I like to introduce how to run sudo without password and pkexec use case.
next.meta_description: Here some introduction to run sudo command without entering a password in linux and macOS and use case of pkexec.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

next.plaintext:
Super user do called sudo in Linux and macOS  is to run commands or programs as
root user. When you use sudo in terminal it is required to enter password every
time that I really don't like because it is not convenient, but there could be a
reason  why password is rquired to enter in sudo every time. (maybe security
reason..I guess)

Linux
 1. open terminal

2.	edit the /etc/sudoers file by typing visudo command

sudo visudo



3.	append the following entry to run all commands without a password 

4.	reboot

reboot

macOS
This for Linux also works in macOS as well.

 1. open terminal

2.	edit the /etc/sudoers file by typing visudo command

sudo visudo

3.	append the following entry to run all commands without a password

user ID ALL=(ALL) NOPASSSD:ALL

4.	reboot

reboot

Trouble shooting
> In case that sudo cannot be executed caused by syntax error, use pkexec. pkexec 
allows an authorized user to execute program as another user.
 1. execute pkexec to run visudo as another user to correct syntax error

pkexec visudo

2. find and fix error

pkexec visudo

2. find and fix error

node.title: 리더의 자존감 공부
node.excerpt: 2021년 3월 14일, '리더의 자존감 공부'를 읽었다.  블로그를 쓰다 보니 오늘이 '화이트 데이'라는 것도 알게 되었다. 이제 어느덧 이벤트에 무덤덤한 나이가 된 것일까? 이어폰으로 너튜부에서 김동률의 '취중진담'이 흘러 나온다.
node.custom_excerpt: 2021년 3월 14일, '리더의 자존감 공부'를 읽었다.  블로그를 쓰다 보니 오늘이 '화이트 데이'라는 것도 알게 되었다. 이제 어느덧 이벤트에 무덤덤한 나이가 된 것일까? 이어폰으로 너튜부에서 김동률의 '취중진담'이 흘러 나온다.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

node.plaintext:
> 2021년 3월 14일, '리더의 자존감 공부'를 읽었다.  블로그를 쓰다 보니 오늘이 '화이트 데이'라는 것도 알게 되었다. 이제 어느덧
이벤트에 무덤덤한 나이가 된 것일까? 이어폰으로 너튜부에서 김동률의 '취중진담'이 흘러 나온다.
 일요일 오전에는 와이프와 아들이 바이올린과 첼로를 배운다. 2015년인가 시작은 같이 했었는데 나의 게으름으로 인하여 나는 포기하고 둘은
포기하지 않고 교회 다니듯이 일요일 오전에 아직 배우고 있다. 농담 삼아 때가 되면 길거리 연주를 시키며 그 동안 투자한 레슨비를 벌겠다 했는데
실력이 그 정도는 아닌듯 하다. 

 나는 일요일 아침 이 시간이 좋다. 내가 좋아하는 얼 그레이 향에 취해 이 넓은 카페를 혼자 독차지 하고, 혼자 만의 시간을 즐기는 이 시간이
이 느낌이 좋다.

 열정을 잃어 버린 지 벌써 4년이 지났고, 열정을 잃어버리니 개구쟁이 마음도 잃어 버렸다. 안 좋았던 기억은 시간이 지나면 마음에서 잊혀져야
하는데 후회 아닌 미련으로 남아 자꾸 돌아보게 된다. 

 나의 혼자만의 시간이 끝나려 한다. 어여 독후감을 써야겠다. 다른 사람을 비난 한다는 것! 일종의 자기 방어인가 싶다. 타인을 있는 그대로
받아 들인다는 것은 무관심 아니면 배려일까? 아직까지는 나와 다름을 비난 한다는 것은 자기 방어의 표현이며 타인을 있는 그대로 받아 들인다는
것은 타인에 대한 무관심이 배려보다는 크다고 생각 한다. 이런 마음이 언젠가는 타인을 배려한다고 생각하기를 바라며 오늘 나의 시간을 마치려
한다.
node.html:
2021년 3월 14일, '리더의 자존감 공부'를 읽었다.  블로그를 쓰다 보니 오늘이 '화이트 데이'라는 것도 알게 되었다. 이제 어느덧 이벤트에 무덤덤한 나이가 된 것일까? 이어폰으로 너튜부에서 김동률의 '취중진담'이 흘러 나온다.

일요일 오전에는 와이프와 아들이 바이올린과 첼로를 배운다. 2015년인가 시작은 같이 했었는데 나의 게으름으로 인하여 나는 포기하고 둘은 포기하지 않고 교회 다니듯이 일요일 오전에 아직 배우고 있다. 농담 삼아 때가 되면 길거리 연주를 시키며 그 동안 투자한 레슨비를 벌겠다 했는데 실력이 그 정도는 아닌듯 하다.

나는 일요일 아침 이 시간이 좋다. 내가 좋아하는 얼 그레이 향에 취해 이 넓은 카페를 혼자 독차지 하고, 혼자 만의 시간을 즐기는 이 시간이 이 느낌이 좋다.

열정을 잃어 버린 지 벌써 4년이 지났고, 열정을 잃어버리니 개구쟁이 마음도 잃어 버렸다. 안 좋았던 기억은 시간이 지나면 마음에서 잊혀져야 하는데 후회 아닌 미련으로 남아 자꾸 돌아보게 된다.

나의 혼자만의 시간이 끝나려 한다. 어여 독후감을 써야겠다. 다른 사람을 비난 한다는 것! 일종의 자기 방어인가 싶다. 타인을 있는 그대로 받아 들인다는 것은 무관심 아니면 배려일까? 아직까지는 나와 다름을 비난 한다는 것은 자기 방어의 표현이며 타인을 있는 그대로 받아 들인다는 것은 타인에 대한 무관심이 배려보다는 크다고 생각 한다. 이런 마음이 언젠가는 타인을 배려한다고 생각하기를 바라며 오늘 나의 시간을 마치려 한다.

node.title: Improving self-esteem in child
node.excerpt: Improving self-esteem in child is that we just remember when your child gets angry "please recognize the child as it is, as it is!"
node.custom_excerpt: Improving self-esteem in child is that we just remember when your child gets angry "please recognize the child as it is, as it is!"
node.meta_description: It is one of the good words that you should have heard or read at least once in parental education or child education.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

node.plaintext:
> Things to remember when your child gets angry
"Please recognize the child as it is, as it is!"
 It is one of the good words that you should have heard or read at least once in
parental education or child education. There are many people who say how to
apply this in a relationship with a child doesn't really touch. That is why many
parents say that it is difficult to practice because they don't know how to do
it specifically.

Photo by Zahra Amiri
[https://unsplash.com/@zahraamiri_?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Respecting childern as they are
 What does "respecting children as they are" mean and how can they be applied in
a relationship with them?

Photo by Will Myers
[https://unsplash.com/@will_myers?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]> 
The method is simple. You just have to acknowledge your child's feelings.
 Recognizing emotions is the first step in a concrete practice way
of'acknowledging a child as it is. It is easy for parents to stand in their
position now and see and judge their child's emotions. It takes practice and
effort to consciously look at the child's emotions from the child's point of
view in order to recognize 'Oh, you are now doing something'.

 Dad puts honey in warm water for the child and handed the cup of honey to the
child because he wanted it to be cool enough to eat. The child opened his mouth
a little and yelled that it was hot. Dad once again took honey water and said,
"What is hot? It is all cold! Now, nothing really is hot", and he gave the cup
of honey again to the child. He looked at it again carefully and screamed "It's
hot and I wanted to drink it, but it's too hot to drink. I am angry and
annoyed."

You just have to admit your child
 Everyone wants to be recognized. The small size of a child does not mean that
the amount of emotion the child feels is also small.

Photo by Ryan Plomp
[https://unsplash.com/@ryancp?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]> 
"Oh, it's hot? Dad looked like it was cool, but it's still hot for you" "Dad
will cool it down quickly~ Hoho, hoohoo~" If you cry while crying?"It takes time
to cool down, and crying doesn't cool down quickly~" The child doesn't stop with
this healing. It only shows a more grumpy reaction. Even in such a case, let's
admit it. "I want to try it quickly, but it's hot so it's hot right away. Isn't
it hard to wait until you can't eat and cool more?"
 There is another advantage to acknowledging your child's feelings like this.
That is, parents consume less energy. Don't run out of energy by saying,'Is you
right, am I right?' This makes it easier for the child to calm down, and the
parent can move on to the next step.


What parents want to say must be done after acknowledging the child’s heart
first. It is well communicated to the child and is heard by the child. Open your
child's ears so they can hear you, and then tell them what you want to say. "It
takes time to cool down, what should we wait while our honey water cools down?" 
The warm finishes that the honey water was cool enough and ate deliciously while
this conversation came and went 

Photo by Glen Carrie
[https://unsplash.com/@glencarrie?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
Recognizing the child's emotions as they are is the first step in a concrete
practice method that acknowledges the child's existence as it is. Recognizing
and responding to your child's emotions allows them to perceive their emotions
and learn how to respond appropriately when feelings are felt.

>  Everyone wants to be recognized, and a child's small size doesn't mean that the
child's emotions are small.
node.html:
Things to remember when your child gets angry
"Please recognize the child as it is, as it is!"

It is one of the good words that you should have heard or read at least once in parental education or child education. There are many people who say how to apply this in a relationship with a child doesn't really touch. That is why many parents say that it is difficult to practice because they don't know how to do it specifically.

Respecting childern as they are

What does "respecting children as they are" mean and how can they be applied in a relationship with them?

The method is simple. You just have to acknowledge your child's feelings.

Recognizing emotions is the first step in a concrete practice way of'acknowledging a child as it is. It is easy for parents to stand in their position now and see and judge their child's emotions. It takes practice and effort to consciously look at the child's emotions from the child's point of view in order to recognize 'Oh, you are now doing something'.

Dad puts honey in warm water for the child and handed the cup of honey to the child because he wanted it to be cool enough to eat. The child opened his mouth a little and yelled that it was hot. Dad once again took honey water and said, "What is hot? It is all cold! Now, nothing really is hot", and he gave the cup of honey again to the child. He looked at it again carefully and screamed "It's hot and I wanted to drink it, but it's too hot to drink. I am angry and annoyed."

You just have to admit your child

Everyone wants to be recognized. The small size of a child does not mean that the amount of emotion the child feels is also small.

"Oh, it's hot? Dad looked like it was cool, but it's still hot for you" "Dad will cool it down quickly~ Hoho, hoohoo~" If you cry while crying?"It takes time to cool down, and crying doesn't cool down quickly~" The child doesn't stop with this healing. It only shows a more grumpy reaction. Even in such a case, let's admit it. "I want to try it quickly, but it's hot so it's hot right away. Isn't it hard to wait until you can't eat and cool more?"

There is another advantage to acknowledging your child's feelings like this.
That is, parents consume less energy. Don't run out of energy by saying,'Is you right, am I right?' This makes it easier for the child to calm down, and the parent can move on to the next step.

What parents want to say must be done after acknowledging the child’s heart first. It is well communicated to the child and is heard by the child. Open your child's ears so they can hear you, and then tell them what you want to say. "It takes time to cool down, what should we wait while our honey water cools down?"  The warm finishes that the honey water was cool enough and ate deliciously while this conversation came and went

Recognizing the child's emotions as they are is the first step in a concrete practice method that acknowledges the child's existence as it is. Recognizing and responding to your child's emotions allows them to perceive their emotions and learn how to respond appropriately when feelings are felt.

Everyone wants to be recognized, and a child's small size doesn't mean that the child's emotions are small.

childHtmlRehype.html:
Things to remember when your child gets angry
"Please recognize the child as it is, as it is!"

It is one of the good words that you should have heard or read at least once in parental education or child education. There are many people who say how to apply this in a relationship with a child doesn't really touch. That is why many parents say that it is difficult to practice because they don't know how to do it specifically.

Respecting childern as they are

What does "respecting children as they are" mean and how can they be applied in a relationship with them?

The method is simple. You just have to acknowledge your child's feelings.

Recognizing emotions is the first step in a concrete practice way of'acknowledging a child as it is. It is easy for parents to stand in their position now and see and judge their child's emotions. It takes practice and effort to consciously look at the child's emotions from the child's point of view in order to recognize 'Oh, you are now doing something'.

Dad puts honey in warm water for the child and handed the cup of honey to the child because he wanted it to be cool enough to eat. The child opened his mouth a little and yelled that it was hot. Dad once again took honey water and said, "What is hot? It is all cold! Now, nothing really is hot", and he gave the cup of honey again to the child. He looked at it again carefully and screamed "It's hot and I wanted to drink it, but it's too hot to drink. I am angry and annoyed."

You just have to admit your child

Everyone wants to be recognized. The small size of a child does not mean that the amount of emotion the child feels is also small.

"Oh, it's hot? Dad looked like it was cool, but it's still hot for you" "Dad will cool it down quickly~ Hoho, hoohoo~" If you cry while crying?"It takes time to cool down, and crying doesn't cool down quickly~" The child doesn't stop with this healing. It only shows a more grumpy reaction. Even in such a case, let's admit it. "I want to try it quickly, but it's hot so it's hot right away. Isn't it hard to wait until you can't eat and cool more?"

There is another advantage to acknowledging your child's feelings like this.
That is, parents consume less energy. Don't run out of energy by saying,'Is you right, am I right?' This makes it easier for the child to calm down, and the parent can move on to the next step.

What parents want to say must be done after acknowledging the child’s heart first. It is well communicated to the child and is heard by the child. Open your child's ears so they can hear you, and then tell them what you want to say. "It takes time to cool down, what should we wait while our honey water cools down?"  The warm finishes that the honey water was cool enough and ate deliciously while this conversation came and went

Recognizing the child's emotions as they are is the first step in a concrete practice method that acknowledges the child's existence as it is. Recognizing and responding to your child's emotions allows them to perceive their emotions and learn how to respond appropriately when feelings are felt.

Everyone wants to be recognized, and a child's small size doesn't mean that the child's emotions are small.

Dad once again took honey water and said, "What is hot? It is all cold! Now, nothing really is hot", and he gave the cup of honey again to the child. He looked at it again carefully and screamed "It's hot and I wanted to drink it, but it's too hot to drink. I am angry and annoyed."

It only shows a more grumpy reaction. Even in such a case, let's admit it. "I want to try it quickly, but it's hot so it's hot right away. Isn't it hard to wait until you can't eat and cool more?"

"It takes time to cool down, what should we wait while our honey water cools down?"

Everyone wants to be recognized, and a child's small size doesn't mean that the child's emotions are small.

node.title: How to improve self-esteem
node.excerpt: People should know how to improve self-esteem and this post will provides you with more information on some actions that you can take to improve it.

node.plaintext:
> Self-esteem is how you feel about yourself and everyone has times to feel low,
which can lead to problems including mental health such as depression or
anxiety.
Doctors advise following things in order to improve self-esteem.

Cook and eat well plated food for yourself
It may make you unconsciously think that you are valuable and precious. Usually,
people with low self-esteem often eat simple meals alone and eat very tasty food
with friends.

Photo by Louis Hansel @shotsoflouis
[https://unsplash.com/@louishansel?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Buy a gift item for yourself
It doesn't matter whether it's one dollar or not. I am generous by buying gifts
for other people but not for myself and always try to choose reasonable or the
cheapest. Recently I bought an audio for myself as a gift and I feel more
happier than before when listening to music.

Photo by Jon Tyson
[https://unsplash.com/@jontyson?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Compliment yourself
People with low self-esteem say bad things to themselves  without hesitation.
Don't forget that these words can hurt yourself.

Photo by engin akyurt
[https://unsplash.com/@enginakyurt?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Make your favorite time and place
The fact that self-esteem has decreased can be seen as a burden of mind that is
difficult for the person to bear. So, making your favorite time and place where
you can reflash yourself is a real rest.

Photo by Sacha Verheij
[https://unsplash.com/@sachaverheij?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Make action plans you want
Let's make a very easy acttion plan you want such as dog walking, take a walk
for 5 minutes. A sense of accomplishment and rewards for me can be achieved
through such a plan.

Photo by Delphine Beausoleil
[https://unsplash.com/@dbeausoleil?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
I hope the above five things can help you improve your self-esteem, and will
introduce more ways to improve.

> don't foget that we all so valuable and precious.
node.html:
Self-esteem is how you feel about yourself and everyone has times to feel low, which can lead to problems including mental health such as depression or anxiety.

Doctors advise following things in order to improve self-esteem.

Cook and eat well plated food for yourself

It may make you unconsciously think that you are valuable and precious. Usually, people with low self-esteem often eat simple meals alone and eat very tasty food with friends.

Buy a gift item for yourself

It doesn't matter whether it's one dollar or not. I am generous by buying gifts for other people but not for myself and always try to choose reasonable or the cheapest. Recently I bought an audio for myself as a gift and I feel more happier than before when listening to music.

Compliment yourself

People with low self-esteem say bad things to themselves without hesitation. Don't forget that these words can hurt yourself.

Make your favorite time and place

The fact that self-esteem has decreased can be seen as a burden of mind that is difficult for the person to bear. So, making your favorite time and place where you can reflash yourself is a real rest.

Make action plans you want

Let's make a very easy acttion plan you want such as dog walking, take a walk for 5 minutes. A sense of accomplishment and rewards for me can be achieved through such a plan.

I hope the above five things can help you improve your self-esteem, and will introduce more ways to improve.

don't foget that we all so valuable and precious.
